description:
Among the updates introduced in COSMIC Alpha 2, there’s a new Bluetooth page in Settings to let you connect and manage your Bluetooth devices, a new Gallery feature in the COSMIC Files file manager that lets users cycle through images in a folder, and new density options under Settings > Appearance to adjust the spacing […]

The post COSMIC Alpha 2 Released with Bluetooth Settings, Much-Improved File Manager appeared first on Linux Today.
title: COSMIC Alpha 2 Released with Bluetooth Settings, Much-Improved File Manager
